hero.name: Amine Beji.
hero.title: I make websites alive.
hero.description: I'm a Full Stack web developer passionate about crafting exceptional web applications with a focus on accessibility and user-centered design.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: Hello! I'm Amine, a passionate Full Stack Developer based in Tunisia.
about.description1: I enjoy creating things that live on the internet, whether that be websites, applications, or anything in between. My journey into programming started back in 2012 when I created my first Facebook account and was amazed by how people could build something like that. This curiosity led me to discover the world of programming and development, and I've been hooked ever since!
about.description2: Fast-forward to today, and I've had the privilege of working at a tech company, a start-up, and teaching at a bootcamp. My main focus these days is building accessible, inclusive products and digital experiences at Cookie Jar Tech for a variety of clients.
about.description3: Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:

description: Developing and maintaining web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks
Implementing responsive and accessible user interfaces
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions
Optimizing application performance and user experience

cookiejar.position: Full Stack Developer & Technical Team Leader
description: Lead development of web applications using React.js, Next.js, GoLang, and Node.js
Manage and mentor development teams to deliver scalable, performant solutions
Implement CI/CD pipelines using Docker, GitLab, and Kubernetes
Architect microservices and distributed systems for high-traffic applications
Collaborate with stakeholders to define technical requirements and project roadmaps
Developed full-stack applications using MERN stack and modern JavaScript frameworks
Led a team of 5 developers in agile environment using Scrum methodology
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs and GraphQL services
Optimized application performance and reduced load times by 40%
Maintained production environments using Docker and Kubernetes
Successfully launched and completed MERN stack bootcamp program
Taught 30+ students modern web development technologies and best practices
Developed comprehensive curriculum covering React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB
Mentored students through real-world projects using Agile/Scrum methodology
Achieved 95% student satisfaction and 85% job placement rate
Developed a comprehensive freelancing platform similar to Fiverr/Upwork
Managed entire project lifecycle from conception to deployment
Implemented real-time features using Socket.io for instant messaging
Gained proficiency in Docker and Kubernetes for application deployment
Created responsive UI/UX designs using modern CSS frameworks
Designed and developed websites for clients using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript
Implemented responsive designs for mobile and desktop platforms
Collaborated with designers to translate mockups into functional web pages
Optimized website performance and cross-browser compatibility

dataStatistics.title: Data Statistics / Looker Studio Reports
dataStatistics.description: Developed a system to gather and refine information from various platforms. Generated Looker Studio dashboards to retrieve refined data from databases and graphically display it for specific customer purposes.

projectTesting.title: Project Testing and Maintenance
projectTesting.description: Implemented new features based on user feedback. Developed unit tests for .NET and C# projects. Automated API testing using Postman to streamline the testing process.

orderAutomation.title: Order Automation System
orderAutomation.description: Developed a system that handles order transitions from the order management system to the delivery system. Created a dashboard to display order history and manage organizational settings.

productsManagement.title: Products Management & XML File Generator
productsManagement.description: Created cron jobs to synchronize product quantities and availability from external systems. Automated XML generation for product feeds and inventory management.

qrCodeGenerator.title: QR Code Generator
qrCodeGenerator.description: A web application for generating QR codes. Users can create QR codes for various types of information such as V-card, links, Wi-Fi network information, and phone calls.

videoPlayer.title: Advanced Video Player
videoPlayer.description: Web application that plays videos and live streams using various formats (HLS, MP4, etc). Features include slides, chapters during videos, and 360Â° video support.

justod.title: JustOd - Booking System
justod.description: Maintained and enhanced a comprehensive booking system. Fixed critical bugs and implemented new features to improve user experience and system reliability.

pinparty.title: PinParty
pinparty.description: Mobile application for party sharing. Users can create party posts and receive requests from others to join their events.

githubSearch.title: GitHub Search
githubSearch.description: Web application that searches for GitHub profiles using GitHub APIs. Displays user statistics and recent repository activity with interactive charts.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: What's Next?
contact.description: I'm currently looking for new opportunities. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, my inbox is always open. I'll try my best to get back to you!
